name: @vidaxl/cowlog
description: Eyecachig logging library for development purposes

scripts.test-unit: node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha tests/unit-tests && npm run clean
scripts.test-dev-coverage: node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha tests && npm run clean
scripts.test: npm run build && PROD=true node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha tests && npm run clean
scripts.build: rm -rf dist;mkdir dist;node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src --presets babel-preset-env --out-dir dist

author: Imre Toth
